description:
This Starship Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 1 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Nadir Starship Pack includes: 
-One digital Nadir Starship
-One digital Shaid Pilot
-One digital Nullifier Weapon

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. 

Trap your enemies in a vortex with the Nullifier's homing missiles. Outmaneuver your enemies with this ship's superior thrust speed and handling. Shaid's Pilot Ability, Vanish, renders her starship invisible, allowing her to stage an ambush or make a stealthy escape.*
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Nadir Starship Pack
